;As with a number of other alcoholic beverages just like beer or wine, vodka too can be prepared at home although you will need to have a distilling kit together with a fermenting kit. But, such kits can also be made just by following instructions from respected websites through the internet or you can as well simply get readymade kits from online stores and be excited on producing your own heavy spirits right at home. You should really remember to firstly test if you are legally allowed to make and consume vodka in your home, backyard or garage before you turn your spirited passion into reality.
;
;Whether you do your own homemade kit or obtain a readymade one to ferment and distill your vodka, you should ensure that that it carries a fermenting bucket with an effective airlock, a copper distilling pot that is enclosed on top and installed with a temperature gauge and a flexible copper pipe, an electric or gas stove to heat your mash, a condensing unit containing flowing cold water or ice to cool-down ethanol vapors, and a collector vessel to gather those sparkling vodka drops at the other end of the copper tube. You will as well need key ingredients just like water, sugar, and numerous other starchy ingredients which include potatoes or grains depending on the kind of vodka that you need to prepare in your homemade kit.
;
;Still, one important ingredient that will surely have an effect on the character and strength of vodka homemade or otherwise is the addition of sturdy vodka yeast. You should buy tough yeast with superb alcohol tolerance levels that can also live through in high temperatures during yeast fermentation. One such fortified dried yeast can be purchased over the internet and can truly work wonders during the ethanol fermentation procedure. This dry yeast is identified as turbo yeast and being fortified with micro nutrients along the lines of amino acids, vitamins, minerals and other enzymes aids this super yeast to give you with natural and potent ethanol even from weaker mashes.
;
;If your ethanol fermentation gives you with tougher ethanol alcohol then your distillation procedure too will be a lot easier considering that you will have to distill your alcohol at least 3 times to result in with strong and smooth vodka. You can then filter your vodka and flavor it with lemon, orange or other exciting flavors if you wish or simply enjoy it in its original form. You can now bring your peers over to your home so as to share your homemade efforts with them.
